name: cylindrically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has the shape of a cylinder : The sweetened cooked rice is wrapped cylindrically in banana leaves with both ends left open. He handed me a blue, cylindrically shaped package.
More examplesFewer examplesYou can wrap the cloth cylindrically around the fluorescent lightbulbs.This method of roasting is ideal for cylindrically shaped foods, like whole birds.The pastry is cylindrically wrapped around the sweet nut filling.The machine contains a number of small, cylindrically coiled springs.
